C

Card - Class in <Unnamed>
The class representing a single Hanabi card.
Card(char, char) - Constructor for class Card
Purpose: Card constructor for other players' cards, takes color and number value and sets both colourKnown and numberKnown to false.
Card() - Constructor for class Card
Purpose: Card constructor for the user cards, sets both colourKnown and numberKnown to false.
CardButton - Class in <Unnamed>
 
CardButton(Card) - Constructor for class CardButton
Basic constructor at the moment just sets field values to those given.
cardList - Variable in class HandBox
 
CardNotFoundException - Exception in exceptions
This exception is used whenever a card position is invalid within a hand.
CardNotFoundException(String) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CardNotFoundException
Create an exception with the specified message.
CardNotFoundException() - Constructor for exception exceptions.CardNotFoundException
Create an exception with the default message.
cards - Variable in class Hand
a collecton that will store the current cards in the hand
changeCardButton(CardButton, Card) - Method in class GameView
Purpose: Sets the card provided to a new card
checkBuildValid(Card) - Method in class Fireworks
Checks if a given card can be added to the stack (valid for default and extended gameTypes)
checkBuildValidWild(Card) - Method in class Fireworks
Checks if a given card can be added to any of the stacks (valid for wild mode only)
checkColourKnown() - Method in class Card
Purpose: returns whether the colour of the card has been given as information.
checkForMessage() - Method in class HanabiClient
Attempted to pull a message from the server and handle it.
checkNumberKnown() - Method in class Card
Purpose: returns whether the number of the card has been given as information.
colour - Variable in class FireworkRectangle
 
colourInformed() - Method in class Card
Purpose: sets colourKnown to true, when a number is revealed to the card's owner
createCardButton(Card) - Method in class GameView
Purpose: Draws the card provided
createGame() - Method in class GameView
Purpose: Creates all the elements for the game table and draws them on the scene
createGame(String, String, int, int, String) - Method in class Server
A function that creates a connection with the server and creates a game as well as instantiates aModel, iModel, aView, aController, game-id and token.
createGameRequest(String, String, int, int, String) - Method in class HanabiClient
A function that will create a create game request.
createHandBox(Hand, int) - Method in class GameView
Purpose: Draws the hand provided
currentTurn() - Method in class GameModel
Purpose: returns the player number whose turn is currently being taken
